title: How does digital publishing work? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technically speaking? I’ll use our latest product Orangedox | Digital Publishing for Creators as an example Signup for a free accountSelect your work (PDF, e-book, graphics etc..) from your Google Drive or Dropbox accountPublish your work and get a simple share link with your audienceShare with your audience and track to see how well it does(optional) Earn ad revenuePublishing is the easy step, most digital publishing platforms today make it super easy once you have a finalized product (PDF, e-book etc..). The hardest part is making money from your work, either by ad revenue sharing or purchasing of your work. The key here is to have an established audience via a social media channel etc. that will allow you to get as many eyeballs on your work as possible.

Digital publishing also makes it easier to share your publication through mediums like email and social media. One of the most important reasons for this global reach is the vast access to the internet. You can reach your targeted markets over a wide range of devices. When you seek the services of digital publishing companies, you will be publishing globally. Once your content is published, it can be seen by readers from all over the world. •	The audience is not limited to a certain distribution market •	You can experience significant increase in your readership •	Your publication can get a global perspective
